name: Friday Night Funkin VS Alucard
description:
This is a Friday Night Funkin mod featuring a shy vampire named Alucard.

Story: The Boyfriend and The Girlfriend goes to visit the Spooky Kids but end up at Dracula's mansion.

The custom chart is played in week 1 on normal mode only.

Instrumentals: Lkmasher

Alucard & Dracula Vocals: Lkmasher

BF Vocals: NyxTheShield

Alucard & Dracula design: Lkmasher
